author: customer
text: Okay so …… I like the concept behind this store and I like the affordability of it. They shipped my item super fast which I appreciated. Now , when it comes to luxury items being delivered I expect a bit more care when it comes to packaging, especially because bags tend to lose their shape and many of the ones sold here are older so I expected some sort of care when packaging and for my bag to be filled with at least paper to ensure the shape remained intact during the delivery process which did not happen. Now my biggest complaint they do not check the bag to ensure it’s clean , my bag arrived smelling like it had been at a garage on the floor for months , I had to hand wash it for at least an hour to stop the water from coming out brown and full of dirt. On that end I’m happy I got my bag but it took unexpected work to make it look decent.
title: Okay so …… I liked the concept

author: Jerry
text:
Come on Real Real … let’s get Real !  Purchased a Hermes Belt Buckle … had a size question .. no one to answer any questions. Wanted to see more photos … wouldn’t show more photos. The description said Excellent and would refund back to credit card. So I pulled the trigger !!  Guess what … buckle all scratched up around the edges .. not Excellent in my book. So …. I returned it and got stuck paying shipping both ways for an item I wouldn’t have bought had their been more photos.
This was a Real Real mess !!

author: Sarah
text: Man once I got past your A hole design forced sign-up pop up I actually loved your site and ordered from it. I liked it so much I recommended it to a friend but as I went to go and copy the link that forced popup sign in box came back again. It made me so angry I told her that I had made up an email address to get in. Most of the site spends a good deal of time explaining that everything is authenticated but then the pop up software makes it feel so scammy it’s difficult to believe. Whoever implemented that forced sign up should be summarily fired (by firing squad)
title: Screw your pop up sign in box

author: Disappointed in Delaware
text:
I ordered two St. John’s pants. They arrived on time but one had a large rip in the fabric on the backside and a hole in the thigh. Also, each had a distinctive and different odor indicative of lack of dry cleaning.

I immediately emailed customer service and have waited four days without a reply.

This was my first purchase. I will hesitate to buy anything else from the RealReal again.
title: Clothes arrived damaged and smelly
